str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From a variation of genos; to procreate; figuratively, to regenerate.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
